idiom.meaning: Beauty so stunning it affects natural world
idiom.example: The legendary beauty attracted admiring glances wherever she appeared

shortDescription: Han Dynasty legends tell of beauty so extraordinary it caused fish to sink (沉鱼) and flying geese to descend (落雁). The phrase combines two legendary beauties: Xi Shi, whose reflection mesmerized fish into forgetting to swim, and Wang Zhaojun, whose appearance caused migrating gees...
